Agentic Workflow.Q: What is the e-Tender notice number and the purpose of the tender mentioned in the document?
Agentic Workflow.A: The e-Tender notice number is NITJ/DRC/PUR/TT/36/2024. Its purpose is to invite e-tenders for the fabrication of a machine for continuous production of textile waste-based composite materials for the Department of Textile Technology.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What are the eligibility criteria for bidders to participate in this tender?
Agentic Workflow.A: The document does not provide this information.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What are the deadlines for submitting the online bids and physically submitting the tender fee and EMD?
Agentic Workflow.A: The deadlines for submitting the online bids, tender fee, and EMD are not explicitly mentioned in the provided context. However, it is mentioned that the EMD and Tender fee shall be submitted on the next working day at the same time if the last date of submission falls on a holiday.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What is the role of Annexure-G in determining supplier eligibility, and how is local content defined?
What is the payment structure for the successful supplier as mentioned in the document?
Agentic Workflow.A: The payment structure for the successful supplier as mentioned in the document is that the Bank will pay the amount due and payable under the guarantee without any demur merely on a demand from NIT Jalandhar stating that the amount claimed is due by way of loss or damage caused to or would be caused to or suffered by NIT Jalandhar by reason of any breach by the said supplier of any of the terms and conditions contained in the order.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What are the warranty obligations for suppliers as outlined in Annexure-F?
Agentic Workflow.A: The document provides the warranty obligations for suppliers as outlined in Annexure-F.

Agentic Workflow.Q: How is the technical bid evaluated, and what criteria are used for shortlisting bidders?
Agentic Workflow.A: The document does not provide information on the specific criteria, necessary documents, and specific requirements used for shortlisting bidders.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What penalties are imposed for delays in delivery or non-performance by the supplier?
Agentic Workflow.A: The supplier will forfeit the Earnest Money Deposit (EMD) in case of delay in delivery or non-performance. Additionally, the Director of NIT Jalandhar reserves the right to impose a penalty of 0.5% per week on account of delay in supply, which will not exceed 10% of the value of the delayed goods.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What does Annexure-E specify about the blacklisting or debarment of suppliers?
Agentic Workflow.A: The document does not provide this information.

Agentic Workflow.Q: What does Annexure-D require from suppliers regarding manufacturer authorization?
Agentic Workflow.A: The document does not provide this information.
